item.title: Men’s Fashion Trouser (Straight Fit) WINTER WHEAT
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A pant is a cloth garment for the upper body. Originally an undergarment worn exclusively by men, it has become, in American English, a catch-all term for a broad variety of upper-body garments and undergarments.
item.content:encoded: A pant is a cloth garment for the upper body. Originally an undergarment worn exclusively by men, it has become, in American English, a catch-all term for a broad variety of upper-body garments and undergarments.
